name: 尤正吉
objective:
先修課程：負責教授同意
力系的平衡，摩擦，面積與質量慣性矩，結構分析，虛功法。
Equivalent Systems of Forces, Equilibrium, Aera and Mass, Momemts of Inertia, Analysis of Structures of Virtual Work.
schedule:
1.Introduction, General Principles
2.Force Vectors
3.Equilibrium of a Particle
4.Force System Resultant (1)
5.Force System Resultant (2)
6.Equilibrium of a Rigid Body (1)
7.Equilibrium of a Rigid Body (2)
8.Structure Analysis
9.Midterm
10.Internal Forces
11.Friction (1)
12.Friction (2)
13.Center of Gravity
14.Centroid
15.Moments of Inertia
16.Virtual Work
17.Dragon Boat Festival
18.Final
scorePolicy:
Mid-Term (40%)
Final (40%)
Homework & Class Test (20%)
Attendance (Extra)
materials: R.C Hibbeler, Engineering Mechanics: Statics, Pearson Education Inc., 14th edition, ISBN=978-986-280-304-2, 2015. 高立圖書有限公司
remarks: 依學校規定，以實體授課為原則；若需遠距離上課，則採「完全同步」或「同步 + 非同步混成」教學，但保留學生須到校進行實體測驗的可能。
